summary: Implemented Coherent Witness Chain foundation (Phases 1-3) in CoherentConstruction.lean. Core structures (BoxContent, WitnessSeed, CoherentWitness) and constructCoherentWitness are complete. Phase 2 has 1 sorry for K-distribution chain. Phases 4-8 blocked on mutual coherence and Zorn saturation. Approach proven viable; axiom elimination requires additional formalization.
